div.div:
OTERPARE Protocol
(One Time Encrypted Remote Password Authenticated Resource Exchange) or just Otto
A PAKE like protocol for client authentication and resource exchange without explicitly sharing password.
Author: Ahmed Noor E Alam (https://github.com/ahmednooor)

div.span: /* server encrypts h with s and gets g,
where s is server's private key
server then stores g along with u
R = u is unique ? OK : ERR

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 863px; margin-left: 588px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Georgia; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
h = decrypt(text=g, key=s)
/* server can locate g with u */
i = decrypt(text=e, key=h)
n = decrypt(text=w, key=s)
/* server can locate w with i */
k = hash(text=h+n, salt=h+n)
y = decrypt(text=x, key=k)
R = y == k ?
v = encrypt(text=n, key=k),
r = encrypt(text=RESOURCE, key=k) : ERR
/* server removes w from storage if exchange was successful i.e. y == k */

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 573px; margin-left: 588px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Georgia; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
n = hash(text=uuid4(), salt=uuid4())
i = hash(text=uuid4(), salt=uuid4())
w = encrypt(text=n, key=s)
/* server generates a random value n e.g. uuid4 and encrypts it with s and gets w. server then stores w along with i, where i is a unique identifier for w*/
h = decrypt(text=g, key=s)
/* server can locate g with u */
j = encrypt(text=i, key=n)
m = encrypt(text=n, key=h)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 223px; margin-left: 48px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Georgia; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
u, p
/* u is username or any unique identifier, p is password */

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 754px; margin-left: 48px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Georgia; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
h = hash(text=u+p, salt=u+p)
n = decrypt(text=m, key=h)
i = decrypt(text=j, key=n)
e = encrypt(text=i, key=h)
k = hash(text=h+n, salt=h+n)
x = encrypt(text=k, key=k)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 503px; margin-left: 48px;

div.span:
INIT
/* ask the server for a random value e.g. uuid4 */

div.span: /* client decrypts v to verify successful exchange. then it can decrypt the r as well to get the RESOURCE

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
